    • Method Detail

      • addFriend

        public void addFriend(UUID id1,
             UUID id2)
        Description copied from interface: FriendManager
        Add the player with ID id2 as a friend of the player with ID id1; this means id1 will trust id2 as a friend. This friendship is not commutative; id1 trusting id2 does not automatically mean that id2 trusts id1.
        Specified by:
        addFriend in interface FriendManager
        Parameters:
        id1 - ID of the player who will do the trusting
        id2 - ID of the player being trusted as a friend

      • removeFriend

        public void removeFriend(UUID id1,
                UUID id2)
        Description copied from interface: FriendManager
        Remove the player with ID id2 as a friend of the player with ID id1; this means id1 will no longer trust id2 as a friend.
        Specified by:
        removeFriend in interface FriendManager
        Parameters:
        id1 - ID of the player who will no longer do the trusting
        id2 - ID of the player no longer being trusted as a friend

      • isFriend

        public boolean isFriend(UUID id1,
               UUID id2)
        Description copied from interface: FriendManager
        Check if id2 is a friend of id1, i.e. if id1 trusts id2 as a friend.
        Specified by:
        isFriend in interface FriendManager
        Parameters:
        id1 - ID of the player to check
        id2 - ID of the possible friend
        Returns:
        true if id2 is trusted by id1; false otherwise

      • getFriends

        public Set<UUID> getFriends(UUID id)
        Description copied from interface: FriendManager
        Get all the friends for the given player; the ID's of those players who are trusted by the player.
        Specified by:
        getFriends in interface FriendManager
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the player to check
        Returns:
        a set of UUID's of all the players trusted by the given player
